citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process between 11am and
11:40 am on 04-DEC-23.
The inspector knocked on the door to the house and the shop just after 11 am on December 4th, there was no answer. A
message was left on the contact number on file at 11:07. The inspector left at 11:40am.
The licensee called the inspector at 8:50am on 05-Dec-23 and explained that they were at work the previous day and that
Tuesday and Thursdays would be better days for inspection.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process between 11am and 
11:40 am on 04-DEC-23. 
The inspector knocked on the door to the house and the shop just after 11 am on December 4th, there was no answer. A 
message was left on the contact number on file at 11:07. The inspector left at 11:40am.  
The licensee called the inspector at 8:50am on 05-Dec-23 and explained that they were at work the previous day and that 
Tuesday and Thursdays would be better days for inspection. 
 
 
End Section
